content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, with easy access to all important facilities. Now, considering the quality of the apartment and its prime location, I think a rental price of 1500 Euros per month would be quite reasonable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a high price for an unfurnished apartment. I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I would be willing to pay 900 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty, Yi-Nuo. However, I must inform you that my apartment is in high demand due to its prime location. I am not limited to local tenants, and I have received offers from potential tenants who are willing to pay a higher price. Considering that, I am not willing to lower the price to 900 Euros per month. I believe a price of 1400 Euros per month is a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your consideration. However, I do not want to pay more than 1000 Euros per month. I think that is a reasonable price for a student apartment in a city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, Yi-Nuo. However, I must maintain the quality of tenants in my apartment complex. I am unable to accept your offer of 1000 Euros per month. Considering the condition and location of my apartment, I believe a price of 1350 Euros per month is fair. This is the lowest I am willing to go, considering your student status.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding. I think 1300 Euros per month would be a fair price for me. I don't want to pay more than that as a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your negotiation skills, Yi-Nuo. However, I must maintain the value of my property. Considering the condition and location of my apartment, I believe a price of 1325 Euros per month is fair. This is the lowest I am willing to go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. I accept your price of 1325 Euros per month. I agree to the price of [1325] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate the deal, Yi-Nuo. I agree to the price of [1325] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo. I look forward to having you as my tenant. Let's proceed with the lease agreement. 'TERMINATE'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
